item.description:
http://mieka-norwood.eventbrite.com/#

Intimate Concert Featuring:

Mieka Pauley

Mieka has opened for Eric Clapton & won Cosmopolitan Magazine Female Artist of the Year

Boston Blues All-Stars: Barrett Anderson (Jimbo Mathius of Squirrel Nut Zippers & Ronnie Earl), Ron Levy (B.B. King, Roomful of Blues & many others) & Friends

Each Blues All-star has shared the stage with the biggest names in Blues, Rock & Americana.

Hayley Reardon

Hayley tours the country at the tender age of 16 while spreading a message of empowerment to her contemporaries. Hayley is in a documentary film about the legendary Club 47 and she was runner-up for Boston Globe Person of the Year 2012!

Tix: $20 for Performance Only @ Lewisâ€™ Bar & Grill (Back Bar)

92 Central Street Norwood, MA 02062 ph: (781) 762-8928

lewisbarandgrill.com

Sunday April 21, 2013

1 PM until 6 PM

Doors at Noon and room reserved until 7 PM (Just in case bands go OT Plus Artist Meet & Greet)
